response.summary: Systems and Computing Engineer from the Universidad Nacional de Colombia, with 4 years of experience in the software development area. Mainly using Microsoft .Net Framework and with strong skills using the C# and Java programming languages. In addition, with different social skills focused on entrepreneurship, leadership and innovation, and with multiple technical skills focused on software planning and implementation, and certainly passionate about algorithms and all their applications.
response.skills: React.js, TypeScript, C#, .NET framework, JavaScript, Scrum, Desarrollo de software, Gestión de proyectos, Comercio electrónico, Algoritmos, Diseño, Programación, Ingeniería informática, Desarrollo de sitios web, Java, C++, Android, MySQL, Python, Entity Framework

profile_positions.description: Carnival Cruise Line Team Member. In charge of the creation of the GoCCL application, using ReactJs and .Net Core.
profile_positions.title: .Net Developer, Soft. Designer

profile_positions.location: Av. El Dorado # 69a - 51 Block B, Flat 2 Of.202, Bogotá (Colombia)
profile_positions.description: Member of the e-commerce team of the organization, focused on the development of the web application "Factura Electronica by OlimpiaIT", which follows the guidelines described by the agile Scrum methodology and takes advantage of the technologies that are at the forefront, such as is C# .NET MVC 5 for back end and AngularJs for the development of the front end. Using a design based on dependency injection and linking the data part with entity framework code first and SQL Server.
profile_positions.title: Software Development Engineer

profile_positions.description: Member of the development team of INGINious Online Judge of the Universidad Nacional de Colombia, a tool designed to make internal programming competitions and to qualify projects or source codes of students in the areas of algorithms, data structures and programming languages. The tool uses web.py which is a web framework for Python and mongodb for data persistence. The Judge is in the following repository: https://github.com/JuezUN/INGInious
profile_positions.title: Web Developer

profile_positions.description: University student intern of the vice-presidency of engineering and projects. Responsible for the development of technological tools using Microsoft SharePoint and Microsoft InfoPath. In addition, member of the information management team that is in charge of the administration of the applications related to the projects of Ecopetrol S.A.
profile_positions.title: University Student Intern

profile_positions.description: Collaborator in topics related to relational databases using MySQL, developing several support activities such as workshop creation and exam qualification.
profile_positions.title: Student Assistant

profile_positions.description: Developer of different business applications using the Microsoft .NET Web Forms framework and DevExpress interface control. In addition, managing databases using entity framework database first and SQL Server.
profile_positions.title: Web Developer

company.name: Globant
company.description:
We are a digitally native company that helps organizations reinvent themselves to create a way forward and unleash their potential. We are the place where innovation, design and engineering meet scale.

- We have more than 27,000 employees and we are present in 25 countries working for companies like Google, Rockwell Automation, Electronic Arts and Santander, among others.

- We were also featured as a business case study at Harvard, MIT, and Stanford.

- We were named a Worldwide Leader in CX Improvement Services by IDC MarketScape report.

- We are a member of the Cybersecurity Tech Accord.

- At Globant, we believe that an inclusive culture and a diverse environment make us stronger. We are an equal opportunity employer (EOE M/F/D/V), always seeking to generate a place for inspiration and growth for everyone regardless of race, color, religion, national origin, sexual orientation, age, marital status, disability, gender identity, or veteran status.

- Our ultimate Diversity & Inclusion goal is to make Globant a respectful, safe, and inclusive workplace for all Globers where gender equality, cultural diversity, and inclusion are core to our DNA. 


For more information, visit https://bit.ly/globant_com
